messages.content:
Answer the given question. You must conduct reasoning inside <think> and </think> first every time you get new information. After reasoning, if you find you lack some knowledge, you can call a search engine by <search> query </search> and it will return the top searched results between <information> and </information>. You can search as many times as your want. If you find no further external knowledge needed, you can directly provide the answer inside <answer> and </answer>, without detailed illustrations. For example, <answer> Beijing </answer>. Question: Please organize a table showing the champion teams of each of the European top five football leagues of 5 seasons from the 2020–21 season to the 2024–25 season, along with the Player of the Season (based on Sofascore ratings) for each season. For each player, include their club at the time and their rating score (keep two digits after the decimal point).

Please present the organized data in a single Markdown table format, do not leave empty cells.
The column headers should be:
League, Season, Champion Club, MVP Player, Club, Rating.

Don't ask me any questions, just output the results according to the columns without omitting cells arbitrarily. The output format is ```markdown
{data_content}
```.?

To compile the requested table, I need to gather the data step-by-step:

<search>European top five football leagues champion teams 2020-21 to 2024-25 Player of the Season Sofascore ratings</search>

Search query: European top five football leagues champion teams 2020-21 to 2024-25 Player of the Season Sofascore ratings
Result: [Doc 1](https://www.sofascore.com/news/sofascore-player-of-the-season-2024-25-full-list-of-winners/):
Sofascore Player of the Season 2024/25: Full List of Winners Discover all Sofascore Player of the Season winners for summer 2024/25. See which top-rated stars stood out based on our Sofascore rating.

[Doc 2](https://www.sofascore.com/news/sofascore-player-of-the-season-race-whos-leading-europes-top-five-leagues/):
Player of the Season Race: Who Leads Europe's Top 5 - Sofascore From Haaland to Modrić, see who's leading the Sofascore Player of the Season race across Europe's top football leagues.

[Doc 3](https://www.facebook.com/groups/leandrotrossard/posts/1751435365495935/):
Highest-rated player of 2024/25 season in top european leagues Joshua Kimmich is the highest-rated player of the 2024/25 season (Top 5 European leagues). — @SofascoreINT.

Search query: European top five football leagues champions 2020-21 to 2024-25 Sofascore Player of the Season Ratings
